post.title: Geek / Blogger Dinner Wed.
post.content: I see from Jim, Rory and Scoble that there’s a “Weblog Meetup” on Wed. evening. It’s at a bowling alley. I hate bowling. I mean, I really hate it. As in I’d consider lighting myself on fire to get out of bowling. But this bowling alley has good beer and Wed is not karoke night. So I think I can make it.

comments.name: Rory
comments.content:
Hey, man – *I’m* sure as hell not going to be bowling

I have no desire whatsoever to stick my body parts into totally unsanitary foot containment devices. I don’t care how many times the shoes have been “sprayed” either – whatever doesn’t kill those bugs is just going to make them stronger.

So, cool I’m not going to be the only non-bowler there…
